headline: Markets Reacted to the Headline Unemployment Rate, Rosenberg Says
summary: BlackRock Portfolio Manager of the Systemic Multi-Strategy Fund Jeff Rosenberg talks about the impact of the November US employment report on inflation and fixed income. He says markets reacted to the higher than expected unemployment rate. "If we look at November payrolls, 64,000 was pretty close to expectations and don't forget we will have another payroll number before the January meeting, that's going to make these other two much less important," he said on "Bloomberg Surveillance."

headline: Jared Kushner Is Everywhere, From Peace Deals to Big Money Deals
summary: Such engagement might have been expected in Donald Trump’s first administration, where Kushner served as a senior adviser.  But it’s a far cry from the future that the president’s son-in-law envisioned just last year, when he told a Miami crowd that he’d stay out of government affairs even if offered a job.

headline: Data and AI firm Databricks valued at $134 billion in latest funding round
summary: Databricks has raised more than $4 billion at a valuation of $134 billion, it said on Tuesday, the ​latest example of investors betting big on the transformative power of ‌artificial intelligence.  The series L funding round was led by Insight Partners, Fidelity Management & Research Company ‌and J.P. Morgan Asset Management.  Investors, including Andreessen Horowitz, BlackRock and Blackstone, also participated.

headline: Taking Stock of BlackRock (BLK): Is the Asset Manager Quietly Undervalued After Modest Recent Gains?
summary: BlackRock (BLK) shares have moved modestly over the past month, leaving investors weighing solid long term returns against a recent dip in the past 3 months and only mid range value metrics. See our latest analysis for BlackRock. At around $1,082 per share, BlackRock has logged a mid single digit year to date share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return in the low single digits suggests momentum has cooled a little after very strong 3 year gains. If BlackRock has you thinking about...

headline: Private investment firms complete acquisition of Allete
summary: Dec. 15—DULUTH — The sale of Duluth-based Allete to a pair of private investment firms closed Monday. Allete — the parent company of Minnesota Power and Superior, Water, Light and Power — is now owned by Canada Pension Plan Investment Board and BlackRock-owned Global Infrastructure Partners. The Minnesota Public Utilities Commission formally issued its written order approving the sale on Dec. ...

headline: Barclays Slashes PT on BlackRock (BLK) to $1,340 From $1,360, Maintains an Overweight Rating
summary: BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE:BLK) is one of the most profitable NYSE stocks to buy right now. On December 12, Barclays slashed its price target on BlackRock, Inc. (NYSE:BLK) to $1,340 from $1,360 and maintained an Overweight rating on the stock. The firm told investors that it revised targets in the brokers, asset managers, and exchanges group […]
